thread.section_title: Everyone Loves Buttons Inc.® Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Everyone Loves Buttons Inc.® | custombuttons.com
thread.title: Ben Thielemann
thread.title_full: Everyone Loves Buttons Inc.® reviewed by Ben Thielemann

author: Ben Thielemann
title: Ben Thielemann
text: The service was helpful, but slow to respond emails in more than one situation. Product quality is good, but was disappointed to find out that the company's web address is printed on the product. At the very least it would have been nice to know that it was going to be put on there prior to us placing our order. We would definitely have preferred not to have it on there. Other than that, we are happy with our experience and would use ELB again.
